mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{productName}, product_price = #{productPrice}, product_category = #{productCategory}, product_detail = #{productDetail}, selling_option = #{sellingOption}, today_product_count = #{todayProductCount}, recommend_product_count = #{recommendProductCount} WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND store_id = #{storeId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM product WHERE store_id = #{storeId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.sql: SELECT p.product_id, p.store_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_category, p.product_detail, p.today_product_count, p.recommend_product_count, pp.product_picture FROM product p, product_picture pp
